participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Emma loves to engage with others and share her interests.
participant_1.background: I put on my favorite pair of jeans made from recycled plastic bottles. I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews. I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews. I wait tables. I own two boxer dogs.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and reflective, Liam finds joy in writing and music, always looking for new experiences.
participant_2.background: No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes. My family is very supportive of my writing. I am close to my family and we often listen to music together. I drove my van to a music festival and met a group of people who made me try new things. I am looking to start a business.

content.text: Pretty well, thanks! So what are you up to these days?
Not much, just writing and trying to start a business.
That's awesome, what kind of business?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about something in the music industry.
That would be cool! I'm not much of a musician myself, but I love listening to music.
Yeah, music is amazing. It's one of the things that brings me the most joy in life.
Me too. It's so powerful. What do you like to listen to?
I listen to a lot of different things, but I mostly listen to indie music.
Nice, I like indie music too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The xx, The Japanese House, and Phoebe Bridgers.
Those are all great! I love Phoebe Bridgers. I saw her in concert a few months ago and she was amazing.
Oh that's awesome! I'm jealous. I've always wanted to see her in concert.
You should definitely go if you have the chance. She's an incredible performer.
I definitely will! Thanks for the recommendation!
